price: There is another sign for them in the night: We strip from it the daylight, and they are left in darkness.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
